name: TodayontheHill
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you interested in learning what our lawmakers are currently working on? Do you want to know what bills are being considered on the Floor? 

Today on the Hill is your premier new source for learning about what our lawmakers are deciding on, when they are meeting, and what information is available to the public.

Learn about House and Senate floor activities, congressional calendars, committee hearings and nominations, and more!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
